name: Hell Rising (DEMO)
description:
Kasandra return back to his land "TORN ISLAND" to save her family from a dark force that has attacked the land.

This is a demo version with only TWO levels ..

To move Kasandra use 

  • Move: Arrows Right - Left
  • Jump : Arrow Up
  • Scalate  : Arrow Up + Arrow Down
  • Fight  : Z or Left Control
    To use her special power you have to wait that the energy level reach the maximum .
  • Enter through the doors :   E 

You can pick-up weapons around the game.

Thanks to :

  • Ramsey Johnson  -  https://soundcloud.com/ramsey-johnson 
  • Adrian Karmanski  https://soundcloud.com/user-590328532 

For creating all the music and Effects on FMOD . Special  Thanks to Ramsey that help me to learn how to use it on unity and implement in the game.

There are keys and levers to unlock the doors . Attention to the traps and enemies around the levels.
